article_title: Health Care Undergoing Huge Transformation: Deloitte Vice Chairman
article_text:

article_metadata.news_keywords: , deloitte, life sciences, homi kapadia, indian american
article_metadata.author: Sunita Sohrabji, India West

og.description: The life sciences sector is currently undergoing huge transformative change, said Deloitte LLP vice chairman Homi Kapadia, who was recently appointed to lead the global consulting company’s Life Sciences practice.
